summary: This is an email chain from March 2020, forwarding an internal FBI update from September 2019 regarding the forensic analysis of DVR systems from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The update states that DVR 1 is operational and under review, while DVR 2, covering the Special Housing Unit (SHU), is not running and requires contractor assistance.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: The sender and recipient of the email forwarding the DVR update. Appears to be an FBI agent involved in the investigation related to the MCC.

events.title: DVR Forensic Analysis Update
events.description: The FBI's Digital Forensic Analysis Unit (DFAU) provides an update that DVR 1 from the MCC is running and under review after receiving a password. DVR 2, covering the SHU, is not running and a contractor is scheduled to assist.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: In September 2019, the FBI's Digital Forensic Analysis Unit was actively reviewing DVR footage (DVR 1) from the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
DVR 2, which covered the MCC's Special Housing Unit (SHU), was non-operational at the time, requiring contractor intervention to restore functionality.
The email chain indicates ongoing forensic efforts related to the MCC, likely in connection with the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
